issue.title: Is it possible to mount/load local folders into osrf/subt-virtual-testbed  image?

content.raw:
To run bash instead of whatever is set to run in the image, you need to supply `--entrypoint` argument to `docker run` call. I have `run.bash`  where I don’t reset `DOCKER_OPTS` which allows me to set them from the outside like this:

`DOCKER_OPTS="--entrypoint /bin/bash" ./run.bash osrf/subt-virtual-testbed:cloudsim_sim_latest` 

which gets me a terminal from any image.
